channel.title: RSBot.org taken over
channel.description:
If you don't already know, or haven't already noticed, http://rsbot.org has been taken over by Jagex.
It's not really an issue since there's already a new RSBot website (http://powerbot.org) :P.
There has been a discussion on the new RSbot forum (http://powerbot.org) that if you visit the RSBot website now, it either logs your IP or flags any accounts that have your IP on them. For this reason, I will post a picture of the site here to prevent you having to visit the site, just incase this is true.
[img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/2505112/rsbot.png[/img]

item.title: RSBot.org taken over
item.dc:creator: @abraham2119 abraham2119
item.description:
@abraham2119 wrote:

[quote=“Newty, post:36, topic:351887”][quote author=abraham2119 link=topic=448242.msg3291607#msg3291607 date=1280639793]

I wonder if they really do check IP’s… I doubt it though because an innocent user may stumble over the site and jagex doesn’t feel like taking in all the complaints that would arise from that…
[/quote]the worst thing they’d do is flag all connections from that ip, which only implies that the client send over mouse events and such, so if you aren’t botting, no harm will be done

Been running the same bot for roughly 40 hours now :o[/quote]i never said the inverse applies

Read full topic

item.title: RSBot.org taken over
item.dc:creator: @smkscape smkscape
item.description:
@smkscape wrote:

The old rsbot owner got sued and had to pay only 1000 euros, thats nothing for him lol.

In 2010 Jagex had managed to track down and sue Qauters, the managing director of the site. The result was an out of court settlement which included a fine of €1000 and a contract for him to never reverse engineer or play RuneScape. Luckily, the site was rescued by Gold4RS who now act as a parent company and have a dedicated part-time employee overseeing operations.

Read full topic

item.title: RSBot.org taken over
item.dc:creator: @im_hard im hard
item.description:
@im_hard wrote:

[quote=“ChaosPkers, post:28, topic:351887”][quote author=Rixxx link=topic=448242.msg3289903#msg3289903 date=1280473982]

they werent “taken over” they were just forced to change the domain cause jagex took rsbot out from under their feet.

Why the hell would Jagex force RSBot to switch to a new domain when RSBot is breaking the law?
[/quote]they said it was against the law to have “Rs” in it :S im just saying what i saw on powerbot though[/quote]

I lol’d so farking hard!

Read full topic
